metadata.author: Enterprise Team
metadata.description: Bookmark Manager Configuration and Setup Slides

slides.title: Welcome to Bookmark Manager
slides.content: Enterprise-grade bookmark management with Chrome sync, security scanning, and package registry integration.

slides.title: Chrome Sync Configuration
slides.content: Configure Chrome bookmarks synchronization. The manager will auto-detect your Chrome profiles and bookmarks.

slides.title: Enhanced Path Configuration
slides.content:
The manager supports multiple ways to specify Chrome bookmarks location:
- Direct path (chromeBookmarksPath)
- Profile name (chromeProfileName)
- Profile directory (chromeProfileDirectory)
- Auto-detection with fallback

slides.title: Security Scanning
slides.content: Scan all bookmark URLs for security issues. Integrates with Enterprise Scanner for comprehensive security analysis.

slides.title: Package Registry Integration
slides.content: Cross-reference bookmarks with npm and GitHub packages. Automatically detects package URLs and fetches metadata.

slides.title: Export and Backup
slides.content:
Export bookmarks in multiple formats:
- Standard JSON export
- Streaming export (memory-efficient)
- SARIF format (for security tools)

slides.title: Statistics and Analytics
slides.content:
Get comprehensive statistics:
- Total bookmarks and folders
- Most visited bookmarks
- Recently added bookmarks
- Usage by folder

slides.title: Integration Registry
slides.content:
Centralized integration management:
- Scanner integration
- Package registry integration
- Cross-reference system
- Unified API for all integrations

slides.title: Configuration Complete
slides.content:
Your bookmark manager is now configured and ready to use!

Features enabled:
✅ Chrome sync
✅ Security scanning
✅ Package registry integration
✅ Enhanced path configuration
✅ Streaming exports
